full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Motor Control Centre Replacement Part
===========================================================

**Reference Number**: WS4291214458-Doc4496321085
**Publication Date**: March 20, 2024
**Tender Closure Date**: April 23, 2024 (2:00 PM EST)

## Tender Details

* **Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* ** UNSPSC Code**: 25173900 (Electrical Components)
* **Industry Classification**: Electrical Components
* **Location**: Ottawa, Canada

## Important Notice

Please note that there has been an amendment to the tender closure time. All responses must be submitted by April 23, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST. Late responses will be declared non-responsive.

## Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a proposal for the replacement of motor control centre part. The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) is the end-user of this service.

## Contact Information

For any inquiries or further information, please contact:

* Jean-Robert Goulet (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [jean-robert.goulet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jean-robert.goulet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Tender Notice URL

You can access the tender notice and attachment through the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19149252?extsite=MTkxNDkyNTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please submit all required supporting documentation and responses by the tender closure date. Late submissions will be deemed non-responsive.  Ensure you carefully review the tender description and requirements before submitting your proposal.
